attributes.title: Do NOT download this app!!!!
attributes.review: This app is poorly constructed. After taking DAYS to download, I entered the app and allowed notifications. Each day I would receive 50-100 notifications!! Even after turning off notifications, I would still receive 50+ alerts. A few days past, and my phone shut down due to the overwhelming amount of alerts. My phone sat on the charger for a week before it could turn on again. The first thing I did when I got back on my phone was delete this app and go on TikTok. TikTok helped me recharge after this excruciating experience. Thank goodness my phone wasnâ€™t permanently broken, and thank goodness for TikTok; however, I hope this review was helpful in guiding others to not download this app.
